title: DO-97-015: Application of 18 U.S.C. § 208 to Employee Service on Boards of Directors of Non-Federal Entities
summary: The Office of Legal Counsel, Department of Justice, issued a memorandum addressing whether 18 U.S.C. § 208 would prohibit Federal Bureau of Investigation personnel from serving on the boards of directors of non-Federal nonprofit entities in their official capacities.
